sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import AdminLink from '../management/AdminLinks'; import { Card, CardContent, Grid, makeStyles, TextField } from '@material-ui/core'; import "./createQuiz.css" import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import services from '../../services/services'; function View() { const {id}=useParams(); const [quiz,setQuiz]=useState([]) const data = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('friend')); const jwt = data['jwt']; useEffect(() => { getQuizBySlug(); }, []) const getQuizBySlug = async () => { const data={ quizSlug:id } const options = { method: 'Post', headers: { "Apiuserid": "49507884", "Scope": "In.QuizApp.READ", "Authorization": `quizApp-oauthtoken ${jwt}`, } } const result = await services.getQuizBySlug(data,options) setQuiz(result.data.data) }; return ( <> { quiz?.map((list,index)=>{ return(

Title

{list.title}

Slug

{list.slug}

language

{list.language}

upload

{list.bannerImage}

Question

Question Name
Answer

Result

Max Score Min Score Result title Phrase Please Upload File ) }) } ) } export default View
